name: Boom Slender Splash - Connect and Match 3 Slenderman Multi-Player Free Puzzle Game
name_original: Boom Slender Splash - Connect and Match 3 Slenderman Multi-Player Free Puzzle Game
description:
Are you up for a spooky challenge? Walk this way if you dare and trust your fate to the mysterious world of Slender and see which hand you’ll will be dealt? Why not match them up and see for yourself in this eerie and addictive slender puzzle game.

Draw the line of Slender with your finger and connect the symbols, move diagonal, up, down and sideways and link as many as you can in the minute you have in the misty forest. Climb your way out of the endless dark and reach the top of the Global Game Center Leaderboards and stay there as long as you can before your friends come lurching through the fog to steal your limelight.

Better still, keep the fear and challenge your Facebook friends to a haunting dash through the mist in the cool Mulit-Player Mode.

Ready? Ok, time to dim those lights and let the lullaby music begin…

Features:

- Match 3 Game Play, pure addiction!
- Haunting soundtrack
- Game Center Leaderboard
- Multi-Player Game Action
